title: Elvira Fernández (businesswoman) - Wikipedia
snippet: Elvira Fernández Balboa (born 27 April 1965), also known as Viri, is a Spanish businesswoman. She is the wife of Mariano Rajoy, prime minister of Spain from 2011 to 2018. Fernández was born in Pontevedra, Galicia to Manuel Fernández (died 2002) and Elvira Balboa.

title: Mariano Rajoy - Biography - IMDb
snippet: Mariano Rajoy. Actor: Mi otro Jon. Mariano Rajoy Brey is a Spanish politician who served as Prime Minister from 2011 to 2018. A member of the conservative People's Party (PP), he previously held several ministerial roles and was party leader from 2004 to 2018.

title: Mariano Rajoy - Wikidata
snippet: El presidente del Gobierno tiene dos hijos varones, Mariano Rajoy Fernández nacido en 1999 y Juan Rajoy Fernández nacido en 2005.
